import * as React from 'react'; import { Button } from '@mui/material' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import "highlight.js/styles/github.css"; import SyntaxHighlighter from 'react-syntax-highlighter'; import { irBlack } from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/hljs'; import CommentList from './CommentList' import NewComment from './NewComment' const Post = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({}) const {id} = useParams() const [dataType, setDataType] = useState("post") useEffect(() => { window.scroll(0,0) fetch("/api/post/"+id) .then(response => response.json()) .then(json => setData(json)) }, [dataType]) return (

{data.subject}

-------------------------------------------------

{data.description}
Created by: Last edited: {data.date}

{data.code}
) } export default Post
